item.title: MAGIC: Multi-Aggregation Custom Edge GIN for Advanced Money Laundering Detection
item.description: Introduction Financial crime detection is a challenging application of machine learning due to severe class imbalances and the complexity of transaction networks. This article introduces MAGIC (Multiple Aggregations for Graph Isomorphism Network with Custom Edges), an enhancement of Graph Isomorphism Networks designed to identify illicit financial transactions. (2025). Money Laundering Detection with Multi-Aggregation Custom Edge GIN.

item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning Approach for Portfolio Optimization and Risk Management: Case Studies
item.description: Introduction Portfolio optimization involves selecting asset allocations to balance expected returns and risk. As the number of decision factors and data sources increases, incorporating non-standard predictors into the optimization process becomes challenging. This article presents a framework for applying deep reinforcement learning to address these challenges. RL portfolio optimization results example Publication and Citation Publication: Analytics in Finance and Risk Management, Chapter 7 Publisher: CRC Press, Taylor & Francis Group

item.title: Deep Hybrid Collaborative Filtering with Content: Advancing E-Commerce Recommendation Systems
item.description: Introduction Recommendation systems are a core component of e-commerce platforms. This article presents the Deep Hybrid Collaborative Filtering with Content (DHCF) architecture, which addresses limitations of traditional recommendation methodologies.
